00042 #ifndef __Macros_h
00043 #define __Macros_h
00044 
00045 #define MSD_lowNaoUtilizado(x)    if (x) x = x
00046 
00047 #define AllSolids(s)              (s) = objary; (s) != SNIL; (s) = SolNxt(s)
00048 #define AllShellsSolid(s, d)      (d) = SolSShells(s); (d) != DNIL; (d) = SheNextD(d)
00049 #define AllFacesShell(d, f)       (f) = SheSFaces(d); (f) != FNIL; (f) = FacNextF(f)
00050 #define AllLoopsFace(f, l)        (l) = FacFLoops(f); (l) != LNIL; (l) = LooNextL(l)
00051 #define AllEdgesShell(d, e)       (e) = SheSEdges(d); (e) != ENIL; (e) = EdgNextE(e)
00052 #define AllVerticesShell(d, v)    (v) = SheSVerts(d); (v) != VNIL; (v) = VerNextV(v)
00053 #define AllCamera(c)              (c) = camary; (c); (c) = (c)->nxt
00054 #define AllAxis(a)                (a) = axsary; (a) != ANIL; (a) = AxsNextA(a)
00055 #define AllGroup(g)               (g) = grpary; (g) != GNIL; (g) = GrpNextG(g)
00056 
00057 #ifdef __curved_env__
00058  #define AllCurvesSolid(s, c)      (c) = SolCurv(s); (c); (c) = (c)->nextc
00059 #endif
00060 
00061 #define InnerLoop(f)                              \
00062    (FacFLoops(f) != FacFLOut(f)) ? FacFLoops(f) : \
00063    ((FacFLoops(f) != LNIL) ? (LooNextL(FacFLoops(f))) : LNIL)
00064 
00065 #define mate(x)        (((x) == EdgHe1(HalEdg(x))) ? EdgHe2(HalEdg(x)) : EdgHe1(HalEdg(x)))
00066 
00067 #define trace_v(v)                                                                       \
00068    fprintf(trace, "*** vertice %3d                       %10.4f %10.4f %10.4f %10.4f\n", \
00069            VerVertexNo(v), VerVCoord(v)[0], VerVCoord(v)[1], VerVCoord(v)[2],            \
00070            VerVCoord(v)[3])
00071 
00072 #define trace_f(ff)                                                                      \
00073    fprintf(trace, "*** face    %3d                       %10.4f %10.4f %10.4f %10.4f\n", \
00074            FacFaceNo(ff), FacFeq(ff)[0], FacFeq(ff)[1], FacFeq(ff)[2],                   \
00075            FacFeq(ff)[3])
00076 
00077 #define trace_sec(x)                                                                                 \
00078    fprintf(trace, "*** sector[%2i] s1a-%4s  s2a-%4s  s1b-%4s  s2b-%4s  seca%2d secb%2d int%2d\n", x, \
00079            ff[SetSecs1a(x) + 1], ff[SetSecs2a(x) + 1], ff[SetSecs1b(x) + 1],                         \
00080            ff[SetSecs2b(x) + 1], SetSecA(x), SetSecB(x),                                             \
00081            SetSecInter(x))
